alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 9:44PM CDT until June 05 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE affecting Meade County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8NNE...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in southern Meade County on downstream into Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 4.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 3.1 feet Monday evening. - Action stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Cimarron River Forgan 8NNE 5.0 4.3 Sun 9 pm CDT 3.4 3.3 3.2 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 945 AM CDT.
